page.title: Shared Libraries
page.subtitle: Reusable libraries that power the entire monorepo ecosystem
page.intro: These shared libraries demonstrate modern React development practices, enabling code reuse across multiple applications while maintaining type safety and consistency.

ui-components.name: UI Components
ui-components.description: Comprehensive UI component library built with React, TypeScript, and Radix UI primitives
ui-components.purpose: Provides consistent, accessible, and reusable UI components across all applications

design-system.name: Design System
design-system.description: Design tokens and theming system with Style Dictionary integration
design-system.purpose: Ensures consistent design language across applications with token-based theming

i18n.name: Internationalization
i18n.description: i18next-based internationalization solution with feature-level translations
i18n.purpose: Enables multi-language support with namespace isolation and SSR compatibility

hooks.name: Custom Hooks
hooks.description: Collection of reusable React hooks for common patterns
hooks.purpose: Simplifies state management and side effects with well-tested hooks

api-client.name: API Client
api-client.description: Type-safe API client generated from OpenAPI specifications using Orval
api-client.purpose: Provides fully typed API calls with automatic code generation

charts.name: Chart Components
charts.description: Chart component library with Chart.js and Recharts support
charts.purpose: Visualize data with responsive and customizable chart components

items.title: Code Reusability
items.description: Write once, use everywhere. Reduce duplication and maintenance overhead

items.title: Type Safety
items.description: Full TypeScript support ensures compile-time error detection

items.title: Consistency
items.description: Maintain consistent UX and behavior across all applications

items.title: Independent Updates
items.description: Update libraries independently with proper versioning

items.title: Tree Shaking
items.description: Import only what you need, reducing bundle sizes

items.title: Testability
items.description: Test once at the library level, benefit across all apps
